Module GraphicsPlayground
Package pizza

Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
pizza.Pizza
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bases, Cheeses, Sauces
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomPizza, MenuPizza
public abstract class Pizza extends Object implements Bases, Sauces, Cheeses
Pizza combines the required basic elements of a pizza, being the base, sauce and cheese, and 5 additional toppings.

This is the Pizza template to be extended for more rewarding pizza toppings

See Also:
  • Topping
  • Cheeses

  • Field Details

    • MAX_TOPPINGS

      public static final int MAX_TOPPINGS
      The maximum number of toppings that can be placed on a pizza.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Pizza

      public Pizza()
      Default constructor which creates a medium cheese pizza with tomato sauce.

      A cheese pizza has a tomato sauce base, mozzarella cheese and no additional toppings.

      This pizza should be called "Dr Java's Pizza" uness/until another name is set.

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(Bases.BaseSize size, Sauces.Sauce sauce, Cheeses.Cheese cheese)
      Creating the base requirements of the pizza with no toppings.

      This pizza should be called "Dr Java's Pizza" unless/until another name is set.

      Parameters:
      size - The size of the pizza base as defined by Bases
      sauce - The sauce on the pizza as defined by Sauces
      cheese - The cheese on the pizza as defined by Cheeses

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(Bases.BaseSize size, Sauces.Sauce sauce, Cheeses.Cheese cheese, List<Topping> toppings)
      Creating a Pizza with a set base size, sauce, cheese and list of toppings.

      Constructor needed for menu items to populate a pizza on construction allowing all toppings to be added through the parameters input.

      Parameters:
      size - The size of the pizza base as defined by Bases
      sauce - The sauce on the pizza as defined by Sauces
      cheese - The cheese on the pizza as defined by Cheeses
      toppings - The list of toppings on the Pizza, List of Toppings
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if toppings.size() > 5
      See Also:
      • Menu

      Returns:
      the list of toppings on this pizza.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the human-readable string representation of this Pizza.

      The format of the string to return is: 

           $Name: is a '$BaseSize' sized base with '$Sauce' sauce and '$Cheese' cheese $Toppings
      Where:
      • $Name is the name of the pizza
      • $BaseSize is the base size of the pizza
      • $Sauce is the Sauce on the pizza
      • $Cheese is the Cheese on the pizza
      • $Toppings is:
        • The empty string if there are no toppings
        • "- Toppings: $Tops" if there are toppings.
          Where $Tops is the string representation of the list of toppings
      For example:fd 
          Dr Java's Pizza: is a 'MEDIUM' sized base with 'BBQ' sauce and 'MOZZARELLA' cheese
      OR, on a pizza with toppings 
          Dr Java's Pizza: is a 'MEDIUM' sized base with 'BBQ' sauce and 'MOZZARELLA' cheese - Toppings: [BACON, PEPPERONI, HAM]
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      string representation of this Pizza

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object other)
      Returns true if and only if this pizza is equal to the other given object.

      For two pizzas' to be equal, they must have the same base size, sauce, cheese and toppings

      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      other - the reference object with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if this pizza is the same as the other argument; false otherwise
